QuestData.Title: Peeking into the Portal
QuestData.Description: I sent Scout Pazaztick to be gettin' a better look at da portal. He shoulda reported back by dis time; what be taking him so long?$b$bDis is what happens when you hire da goblins as help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Scout Pazaztick and use her telescope.
QuestData.RewardText: Dis not good. Them Iron Horde be causin' a lot of da trouble round here. We need ta find a way ta deal wit dim.
